author: Scott Polacek
title: Open Wheel Nationals to Be Run in Front of Fans in South Dakota Amid COVID-19
description: While much of the sports world is on hiatus and looking at the possibility of an immediate future of no fans in stadiums when games and events do return, the Open Wheel Nationals is taking a different route during the coronavirus pandemic...
content:
Kevin C. Cox/Getty Images
